name: The World We Don't See
description:
After waking up in a mysterious location, use a seemingly ordinary camera to navigate an unfamiliar area and solve puzzles along the way.

If you are stuck, make sure to try everything! You may need to backtrack or undo some progress to beat the game.

The World We Can't See is a short puzzle game made for the KawaiiSun SJam 1. The game was made in 3 days and the theme for the jam was "Cameras". Please keep in mind that this game might have bugs or other underlying issues since the time limit gave a restrictive testing window. Enjoy! 

Music: https://www.playonloop.com/           

Some SFX: https://freesound.org/          

 Any music and SFX used from these sites are licensed under Creative Commons.
